content.body: **Call for reviewers for the [ESM Source Phase proposal](https://github.com/tc39/proposal-esm-phase-imports/issues/26)** - as we did not yet confirm the list at plenary, we would like to try and confirm our reviewers before the next meeting. Please respond here or DM me to be added to the reviewers list for the proposal.
